testsuite.name: testCases.TC023_VerifyAddressDetailsInCheckoutPage

testcase.name: testVerifyAddressDetailsInCheckoutPage
testcase.system-out:
Navigating to baseURL: http://automationexercise.com Home Page is displayed successfully Navigate to home page and verified 'New User Signup!'- is visible,(Signup Page is opened Successfully) Entered username: SCphLw Entered Email: JKaKJg@gmailGoNe Filled account details Clicked on Create Account 'Acount created'- is visible 'LoggedInAs: SCphLw
Add products to cart, Click 'Cart' button, Verified that cart page is displayed Verified that the delivery address is same address filled at the time registration of account Verified that the billing address is same address filled at the time registration of account Deleted the account and the HomePagedisplaced
